Package com.rotartsi.jgame.math

Class Vector2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rotartsi.jgame.math.Vector2
  • public class Vector2
extends Object
    Vector2 useful for adding two sets of coordinates such as applying velocities.

    Implements distanceTo(), velocityTo(), and angleTo()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Vector2 origin  
      double x
      The first double in the the set.
      double y
      The second double in the set.

    • Method Detail

      • projectOnto

        public Vector2 projectOnto​(double slope,
                           double y_intercept)
        Project a point onto the specified line using a parallel line passing through this point and finding where it intercepts with the specified line.

        NOTE: If a NaN slope is supplied, the argument y_intercept would be interpreted to be the x_intercept.

        Parameters:
        slope - Slope of line
        y_intercept - The Y offset of the line
        Returns:
        Point that fits onto the specified line.

      • distanceTo

        public double distanceTo​(Vector2 target)
        Get the distance from this point to the target Gets ∆x and ∆y and plugs them into the pythagorean theorum
        • distance = sqrt(pow(target.x - this.x, 2) + pow(target.y - this.y, 2))
        Parameters:
        target - Target Vector2
        Returns:
        Distance in the form of a double
